name: cactus
care: Needs sunlight weekly at least one, and water it well

name: OAS penny worth Dollar plant
care: It is a plastic cup grown plant. It won't survive for a long time, maximum life expectancy is 1 month, so it is more like a decoration, but one still needs to water it if you want it to look good and fresh (at least 2 times a day) as long as possible
